instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message:
I have  MacBook Air which is not charging correctly, machine drain over 1 A when screen is on, when powered off, shows current going into it is 0.00A. Once powered back on drains only 0.45A, after reconnecting charger back to normal charging. 
tried C-type side boards a few, different chargers cables. tried another battery no luck. 
board looks clean no corrosion. 
Any ideas on this? 
Thanks

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message:
Start telling us the correct code of your board.
Or the Air model?

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message: sorry typo, it is 820-01521 MacBook Air 13 A1932

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message:
Machine charges battery only after disconnect/reconnect the charger?
Did you test with known good battery?

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message:
correct, machine is charging battery only after reconnect the charger. 
yes I tried 2 new batteries they acting exactly like the original one.

threads.title: MacBook Air 13 820-01521 not charging correctly
threads.message: Save data and try DFU restore.
